tool_description: An API that tells you the real time climate change NEWS all around the world for you
name: Climate change market
title: Climate change market

api_list.name: climatechange api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-market.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
